name: Geomancy
description: You spend time to absorb the natural energy around you, sharply increasing your effect in battle. When you activate this move, your speed increases by 10 feet and all of your attacks and saving throws are rolled with advantage for three rounds.

effect.name: Gets the Pok√©mon pumped up. Helps prevent nervousness, too.
effect.effect: Doubles the Appeal Points of a successful move in the next round. Pokemon also has advantage on CHA Saving Throws until after their move next round is performed.
